title: What font is this? Please help!
content:
Hi this is an image I found of a mock-up new Instagram layout. Does anyone know what font is used for the words:  
 "billskenney, alagoon" next to the heart?  
(Above the 'like' and 'comment' buttons)

Any help would be appreciated! Thank you!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [photo.JPG](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415121303/http:/typophile.com/files/photo_50.JPG) | 66.36 KB |
author: wojipup

comments.content: Very smal and blurry but may be as simple as [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150415121303/http:/www.myfonts.com/search/helvetica+neue)...
